Aug. 17, 1912 D Boldon Contest
Boldon Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
boldon-contest
None
The Old Abbey
Boldon Colliery Village, County Durham
Prizes 1st £6 and cup, 2nd £3, 3rd £1.
Best cornet - Hebburn Colliery, best horn - Cleveland Steel Works.
4 bands competed.
Promoted by Boldon Colliery Band.
